sessions.title: Coffee & chill
sessions.moreInfo: Kick back, relax, grab some coffee and pretend not to be super excited about all the things you're gonna learn today! üëå

sessions.title: O(n)Week retro & program overview
sessions.moreInfo: Get ready for your first solo retro! Be gentle, Greg has feelings ya know...

sessions.title: Lunch
sessions.moreInfo: Time to vent to your mentor about Greg's talk, but be careful, Greg has spies all around Richmond!

sessions.title: Intro to REA and our LOBs
sessions.moreInfo: Did you know REA is made up of different teams?!?! That's right! More specifically, at least 4 teams... I think.

sessions.title: Intro to engineering
sessions.moreInfo: There's nothing better than kicking off the day with a session on super high tech stuff and there is no one more qualified than Steve to deliver this session. Don't let his big muscles üí™ and nickname (Super Tank) alarm you, he is the sweetest guy in all of REA.

sessions.title: Morning tea / snacks
sessions.moreInfo: Snackssssssssss! How many can you eat in 15 minutes?

sessions.title: Intro to systems
sessions.moreInfo: You've heard all about engineerings, now it's time turn up the dial and learn about all the systems at REA, what's the difference? You're about to find out! And hopefully so am I...

sessions.title: Lunch
sessions.moreInfo: Did someone say lunch? üå≠üåØüç™üç©üçüüçîüçïü•ìüçñü•ê

sessions.title: Compliance training
sessions.moreInfo: This is ummm going to ummm be ummm really really fun! Yep!

sessions.title: Coffee & first 1:1
sessions.moreInfo: Thank goodness that compliance training is over! Now, go catch up with your rotation lead and have your very first one on one. Don't worry, it's not as scary as it sounds! Or is it..?

sessions.title: Compliance training, again
sessions.moreInfo: Oh no, not again.

sessions.title: Pairing at REA (devs only)
sessions.moreInfo: Working together is one of the most important aspects of working at REA! Pairing together on a card is a fantastic way to get up to speed and also share knowledge across the team! We are all about pairing üçê

sessions.title: Morning tea / snacks / free time
sessions.moreInfo: More snackssssss, remember to say thanks to Greg for persuading REA to give him budget for snackssss.

sessions.title: Lunch
sessions.moreInfo: We think it's about time you got to know your first rotation team. Follow your rotation lead and they will introduce you to the wonderful people you will be working with for the next 6 months üòÅ

sessions.title: Resilience / Self Development
sessions.moreInfo: James, don't forget to write about this. Good work!

sessions.title: Intro to being a mentee
sessions.moreInfo: You're mentors want the create the best possible experience for you here at REA, and this session will teach you how to exploit their kindness and generosity so you can have the best rotations ever! No, not really, but there is some really useful information in this sessions for you.

sessions.title: Morning tea / snacks
sessions.moreInfo: What do we want? MORE SNACKS! When do we want them? NOW!.

sessions.title: Lunch
sessions.moreInfo: BYO lunch this time! Maybe bring some giant jenga along with you and have a chill out session with your 6.0 family.

sessions.title: Things I have learnt as an adult
sessions.moreInfo: Here is a little known secret that all adults try their best to cover up: No one knows what they are doing and we are all making it up as we go along ü§Ø. Being an adult is sometimes hard, luckly we have Kate here to provide some lessons and advice.

sessions.title: System set up
sessions.moreInfo: Woo we get to play with our computers now! Let your 5.0 buddy show you the ropes and help get your system set up and ready to smash out some work.

sessions.title: Intro to strategy
sessions.moreInfo: Do you like chess? ‚ôü Sometimes a business is just like chess! You need to plan 5 moves ahead and think about what your opposition is trying to do to get ahead of you! That's where strategy comes in. Sit back and stay sharp cause you gon' learn a lot in this one.

sessions.title: Morning tea / snacks
sessions.moreInfo: What? A whole hour for snacks?!?! ü•∞ I think I'm in love.

sessions.title: Benefits bingo
sessions.moreInfo: Did you know there are other benefits than being paid once a month at REA? It's true! Enjoy this gameshow style session where you'll learn about all the perks offered to you as an employee.

sessions.title: Lunch and [top secret]
sessions.moreInfo: Enjoy some lunch with your mentors, then embark onÔ∏è a top secret journey that has probably already been spoiled for you cause people are sometimes like that and don't like to let other people have any fun. ü§¨
